item.description:
Hey everyone -

A member of the group, Tom Shackelford, is planning to take a leisurely ~45 mile ride on Saturday (tomorrow). If you're interested in joining him, plan on meeting at the Shaw's parking lot at 10:30am. Remember to bring snacks/lunch and WATER!! Tom plans to ride at a leisurely pace and will stop and rest when needed.

Enjoy the last month-ish of summer!!

If you have any questions, please contact Tom directly (401.369.5615 or tombike148@gmail.com)
item.name: LAST MINUTE RIDE: ~45 miles -- leisurely ride around Sharon/Easton/Norton/Tauton
